channel.title: Consumer Discretionary on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Consumer Discretionary on TechnoStreet

item.title: Roku's Streaming Stick 4K hits a new low of $25, plus the rest of the week's best tech deals
item.description: Roku’s Streaming Stick 4K hits a new low of $25, plus the rest of the week’s best tech deals Black Friday doesn't officially arrive for a few more weeks, but we're already starting to see retailers run early holiday sales on several gadgets we recommend.

item.title: Etsy adds image-based search, but only on iOS for now
item.description: Etsy adds image-based search, but only on iOS for now Etsy has begun testing visual search.

item.title: Canon R6-II hands-on: Faster, more resolution and reduced heating issues
item.description: Canon R6-II hands-on: Faster, more resolution and reduced heating issues Just two years after the launch of the original EOS R6, Canon has unveiled its successor, the $2,500 EOS R6 Mark II.

item.title: Sony's high-resolution A7R V mirrorless camera now shoots 8K video
item.description: Sony’s high-resolution A7R V mirrorless camera now shoots 8K video Sony has launched the $3,900 A7R V, its latest mirrorless camera designed to shoot portraits, landscapes and other subjects that require as much resolution as possible.
